_header: This child is was and ay shall be
_description: James Ryman, a Nativity carol — ten 3-line stanzas (aab) with refrain (b), ‘There is a childe a heuenly childe’ and burden (bb): ‘Ther is a chielde a heuenly childe / Iborne this nyght of Marie myelde’

CULEe112.First Lines:
This chelde is was & ay shall beOne in godhede in persones
                    thre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Whenne he shalle comme and Iugement makeTo blis with hym this
                    chielde vs take
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 210-11.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 34; 1977, 27-8.
